lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to Algebra
lessons.content: This lesson covers the basics of algebra, including variables, equations, and functions.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Geometry Basics
lessons.content: This lesson introduces the fundamental concepts of geometry, including points, lines, and shapes.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Trigonometry
lessons.content: This lesson explores the principles of trigonometry, including sine, cosine, and tangent functions.
